mapper.update: update cs_out_storages set process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_num = #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_types = #{orderTypes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, status, order_id, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, order_types, quantity from cs_out_storages where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
